name: Angels&Deamons
description:
This Is the game made for the GE Game Jam #3!

Controls:

Player1: WAD to move, E or Shift to interact or pickup

Player2: Arrow Keys to move, Alt or Enter to interact or pickup

R to reset level

It was made in 1 week with the theme Duality.

An Angel and A Deamon Trapped inside a slumbering dream, can they work together to save the host, or will they forever be trapped in a never-ending nightmare...
